text: Pilosocereus multicostatus is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Brazil, in northern Minas Gerais state. Its natural habitat are rocky areas. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ==Sources== * Taylor, N.P. 2002. Pilosocereus multicostatus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Pilosocereus multicostatus
